name: Kenzen Robo Daimidaler
nutshell: To fight against the mighty Penguin Empire, a secret organization known as the “Prince Beauty Salon” has developed the Daimidaler, a giant humanoid robot powered by a source of energy known as “Hi-ERo particles”. Since high school student Kōichi Madanbashi possesses a high amount of this rare energy in his body, the organization sends Kyōko Sonan to get him to pilot the Daimidaler. However, to release his special power, Kōichi must do something perverted with a girl.

name: LOVING YOU FOR NO REASON
nutshell:
Jane came to Hainan to relax after losing both her job and her boyfriend. She made the acquaintance of Tyler, a young CEO of a tech company and because she was embarrassed to say that she is unemployed, she told him that she is an employee of a real estate company without knowing the real owner was standing right next to her. But not only did he not expose her lie, but also told everyone that she was his assistant… In ten days in paradise, Jane made many wonderful experiences as an "assistant" and meanwhile, love has also quietly sprouted…
https://www.iyouman.com/106617/

name: Nana to Kaoru - Pink Pure
nutshell: Spinoff 4-koma comic of Nana to Kaoru drawn by Momose Tamami, serialized in Young Animal Arashi magazine.

name: Haruyo, Koi!
nutshell: Kumoro Tsuyoshi is in his third year in middle school, and is in the midst of studying for his entrance exams. He wants to go to the same school as his childhood friend, Kamijou Haru, who's two years his senior, since she's his crush. Will he succeed?

name: Kageki Shojo!!
nutshell:
"I Sarasa Watanabe, will be Lady Oscar!" The "Koka Revue " was founded in the Taisho Era (1912-1926) and was composed entirely of unmarried women. The adolescence of the girls who enrolled in this music school begins...!
Sarasa and her classmates are fed up with the lectures in the pre-college class, so they ask the instructor for some practical training...?

name: Mizuiro Idea
nutshell:
A light hearted comedy which revolves around the hearty efforts of Wakaba to make her dream come true. She becomes friends with Hidaga in the hopes that they can join the school's manga club. However, the manga club has not been active lately due to something that happened in the past and Hidaga seems to be hiding something too. Wakaba has plans for the manga club to ultimately achieve her dream.
Note: Publication of the second volume was cancelled by the publisher. Chapters that could comprise the second volume are still available at Comic Walker website.

name: Oppai Nante Tsuite Konakute Yokatta
tags: Oneshot,Girls' Love,Philosophical,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell:
The bigger the breasts, the heavier the burdens.
Original Yuri Manga desu. (創作百合漫画です)
Artists' Twitter: https://twitter.com/inknoshimi
Source: https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/82040230

name: Boogiepop wa Warawanai
nutshell: This prequel to the Boogiepop Phantom series deals with the sudden disappearance of several female students at Shinyo Academy. Are they runaways, abductees, or murder victims? Couple this mystery with the sudden appearance of a mysterious apparition known only as Boogiepop, and even more questions arise in the mind of Keiji, a student who can see and converse with the strange spectre. Who or what is Boogiepop? Is he responsible for the abductions, or is he trying to stop them? Why does he have the appearance of Keji's girlfriend, Touka?

name: Alternative Ending Coupling Relay
nutshell: A sequence of one-panel comics of alternative pairings, mostly related to non-canonical endings of the games, arranged as a relay.

name: Yuri!!! on Ice - Love for You, Tears for Me (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Yuuri Katsuki x Victor Nikiforov

name: Kyou, Koshiba Aoi ni Aetara.
nutshell: The latest manga by the creator of Masamune-Kun's Revenge. The story of Kyo, Koshiba Aoi ni Aetera follows Sahoko, a girl who values what others think of her, and Aoi, a girl who is able to let out her true self without caring about what others think. To get closer to Aoi whose candid air appeared shining, the action that Sahoko takes to get closer is… a kiss.

name: The Shadow of the Moon
nutshell: Yang Sohwa could see ghosts ever since she was little. For the past few years her visions have stopped, but now they are reappearing and she’s about to find out the tragedy that occurred hundreds of years ago on her school grounds.

name: The Polaris
tags: Official Colored,Ghosts,Long Strip,Romance,Boys' Love,Drama,School Life,Fantasy,Web Comic,Supernatural,Mystery,Full Color
nutshell: On a pitch-black night, corporate wage slave Qi Yan sees his first love — the one that had passed 10 years before. After quite a bit of pestering and persuasion, he finds himself forced into the miserable lifestyle of working during the day and investigating at the night. The topic of the investigation? Finding out who the culprit is. Can the top who had passed years before successfully manage to be resurrected?

name: Love Live! - After all, Nico is the older one! (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
In which I thought this was going to be a quirky comedy but it turned into insecurity drama.
{ Nico x Maki }

name: Jokyouju no Hatsukoi Case Study
nutshell:
"You have a nice body." With that, the associate professor offers him a part time job, looking after him.
Shattered by the losses of his two-year relationship and nine-year job, Asahi has nowhere to go. But when his father is hospitalized, he ends up helping at his parents' restaurant. There, he meets professor Yuzuru Togame, who is slouching and scoffing down his food. Despite being seven years Asahi's senior, Yuzuru turns out to be pretty hopeless as he eats with his chopsticks clenched in his fist, and then falls asleep mid-meal! Asahi accepts Yuzuru's offer of a part-time job without much thought, but…!? This is a case study of love – between a broken-hearted but meddlesome younger man, and a hapless professor.

name: Please, wear it, Mr. Han!
nutshell:
유청명(22) 대학생 X한결(34) 경찰 경장
신입생 환영회 시즌에 술에 취해 인사불성이 된 청명을 도와준 것을 계기로 사귀게 된 두 사람.
청명은 한결에게 정복 입은 모습을 보여달라고 꾸준히 부탁했지만 거절당했다.
성탄절 한결을 기다리다 잠든 청명을 깨우는 한결이 드디어 정복을 입고 나타나는데...

name: Sun Ken Rock Gaiden - Dango Knight
nutshell: After Pickaxe moved out for Seoul Pickaxe spend his life as a NEET but one day he finds a strange suit that allow him to become a the Dango Knight. While searching to make money out of his new situation, he’ll come to face the hyper dangerous evil organisation Dark Roach and its sexy leader…

name: The Boy Next Door
tags: Award Winning,Long Strip,Comedy,Web Comic,Slice of Life
nutshell:
A story about two awkward men who lived next door to each other.
The winner of 2014 Best College Manhwa

name: Koi mo, Tenki mo.
nutshell: Mai Mikoshiba, who has always been second in dexterity no matter what she does, finally makes her debut as a weather girl on the national news program "Morning Glory"! Ryuji says, "Read my manuscript word for word without making mistakes. That's my job." However, I was attracted to the seriousness of this sad-looking man who seriously tackled his work as a weather forecaster...?

name: Itsuka, Kimi ga Tonari de Mezametara
nutshell: Aizawa Daichi and Hoshiakari Mei are childhood friends, who meet again after 7 years, one of them hides a secret. A story of a boy and a girl who living to the fullest.

name: Wangan Midnight: C1 Runner
nutshell:
By the 2010's, the Japanese racing scene is largely off the street and has moved onto the circuit thanks to heightened police enforcement. Most tuners from the old era have moved on from it, becoming everyday mechanics.
Shinji Ogishima is a rising automotive journalist who aspires to revive the tuning magazine, GT Cars, in the modern era.
While doing so, he encounters Nob Setoguchi. A young street racing rascal driving an FD RX-7. Who, despite being good behind the wheel, doesn't know anything technical about cars, driving, or journalism. And so Nob begins his journey as a budding car enthusiast with the revived GT Cars.

name: I Want to Round You Square
nutshell:
In exchange for lending him a room, Yuu asks Junpei to teach her about love. And what better way to learn than through first-hand experience…?
Artist's Twitter
Note: has nudity and/or sexual references in some chapters. Do not read for the ecchi; you'll be disappointed.

name: Saenai Kanojo (Heroine) no Sodatekata ~egoistic-lily~
nutshell:
A highschool otaku named Aki Tomoya runs into his dream girl one day…only to find that she has the faintest presence to his chagrin!
Now with his otaku passions, Tomoya wants to turn the girl into a heroine in the only realm he is familiar with: 2D dating simulation game. To accomplish this objective, he scouts Sawamura Spencer Eriri, his half-foreigner childhood friend equipped with artistic talent, as the illustrator, and Kasumigaoka Utaha, a famous prodigy writer, as the script writer.

name: Touhou - Sake to Yatai to Akumu no Onna (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A Renko x Maribel doujin.

name: Bremen
nutshell: Reiji and Kasuga head out to Tokyo to become the "Gods of Rock," but they seem to always attract trouble. On their way, Hayama Ryo and Fujii Ran join them in their quest. Despite its rockstar type look, this manga really is about action.

name: Venus Kiss!!
nutshell: Ikumi has always admired his senpai but one day, his senpai rapes him…

name: Milk Crown Lovers
nutshell: Milk Crown is a story about a 15-year old girl named Tachibana Oto who leaves all her brothers and sisters at the orphanage to go work as a maid in a high school with a dorm (naturally, she will also be taking classes at this school, like everyone else). At this new high school dorm she's staying at, there are some pretty crazy people.

name: Saint Fighter Devilman
nutshell: Zenon, the ruler of the demon world, declares the extermination of mankind and begins an invasion of the Earth. However, one of the four heavenly demons, Amon, rejects humans as weak beings whom they don't need to fight, and attacks Zenon, only to be defeated by his overwhelming power. Amon is exiled from the demon world and continues to fight numerous assassins, and escapes to the human world with a mortal wound, where he meets a human boy, Kamishiro Kei. Kei is targeted by the demons for saving Amon, but despite his panic, he chooses to muster his courage and act as a decoy in order to help his friend escape. What will happen if his strong will is matched by strong power? Amon, intrigued, merges with Kei to save him, becomes Devilman, and throws himself into the battle against the demons.

name: Mysterious Rain Jack
nutshell: Mysterious Rain Jack is a short Star Wars parody with a main character who looks like Kurikinton Soramame. The manga marks debuts of Thunder Ogre Goronbo, Drop-kun, and R2-D2; three characters who also make appearances in Toriyama's later manga Dr. Slump. As well as several aliens who also make cameo in Dr. Slump.

name: Yousuke no Kimyou na Sekai
nutshell: 20-volume anthology of short stories, from surrealism to horror, featuring Yousuke's lovely art style.
